alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Frontier County through 500 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 21 miles southeast of Curtis, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orafino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
